name: Special Forces VR
description:
We are very happy to announce our latest project: ‘​SPECIAL FORCES VR​’ a multiplayer tactical VR shooter. The game delivers an immersive gameplay which overcomes the weaknesses of many similar titles. With High-end graphics and dynamic movement system: the game brings a breath of fresh air into the classic military-vs-terrorists genre.

The game supports a wide range of VR gear. Even if this gear is not mandatory to play our game, compatibility with it makes SF:VR a perfect title for the e-sport market! In the list of supported gear we highlight: PlayStation’s AIM / Haptics suits / Guns / Multi-directional locomotion bases. HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and PlayStation VR owners will soon get a chance to test this next-level multiplayer VR shooter. It is one of the first titles offering cross-platform multiplayer, allowing deathmatches with console and PC gamers on the same maps. The game is planned to be released later this year, although a closed beta will be launched in September. Players can already register for it on our website.

Game’s key features are:

● free movement system, without teleportation: intuitive, smooth & motion-sickness-free

● haptic suits, multi-directional locomotion simulators, and gun controllers support

● immersive, tactical gameplay with great physics and collision systems

● cross-platform multiplayer

● wide choice of multiplayer modes, from deathmatch / team deathmatch, through rescue-the-hostage to complex co-op scenarios

● high-quality graphics

SPECIAL FORCES VR​ allows free movement around the map and doesn't require the player to use a teleportation system, very common in such games. Developers
have applied several solutions to protect players from any nauseating effects of the virtual movement.
